---
category: news
title: "Lockheed Execs on Advancing Ethical AI Platforms Across the Government"
excerpt: "The Bethesda, Maryland-based aerospace and defense contractor is pursuing the development of ethical AI platforms through the Lockheed Martin AI Center and AI Factory. Taylor, Forrest and Harasimowicz wrote that Lockheed offers AI-enabled capabilities and basic tools through LAIC to facilitate the deployment of existing and new AI programs to support government clients and internal operations."
